text: Jagodnja () is a village in the municipality of Bratunac, Bosnia and Herzegovina.Official results from the book: Ethnic composition of Bosnia- Herzegovina population, by municipalities and settlements, 1991. census, Zavod za statistiku Bosne i Hercegovine - Bilten no.234, Sarajevo 1991. 286 inhabitants lived in Jagodnja in 1991, of which 284 (99,30% of the population) were Muslims. In 2013, it had a population of 60 inhabitants. ==References== Category:Villages in Republika Srpska Category:Populated places in Bratunac
title: Jagodnja (Bratunac)
